reviewText:
An inmate has been killed in one of Denmark's prisons. Then another is killed. DCI Katrine Ries Jensen (Laura Bach) and Dr Thomas Schaeffer (Jakob Cedergren) are on hand to investigate. In this story we discover a little about the background of both Jensen and Schaeffer.
The gripping conclusion has Jensen in yet another life-threatening situation.
As with previous episodes, Lars Mikkelsen also appears as Bisgaard.
Danish drama at it's very best!
